title: Skids Sell Pumps: Lezyne’s New “Gravel” Floor Pumps
content: Our friend Andrew Juiliano breaks down Lezyne’s new mid-volume floor pumps. These pumps are in-between a high-pressure road pump and a high-volume, low-pressure mountain bike pump, which makes sense. For $99.99, you get a digital interface Pro-line floor pump, for $79.99 the standard model, and the standard “analog” pump runs $64.99. See more at Lezyne.
author: prolly
